title: White House confirms deadline for trade deals
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt confirmed the administration has sent a letter to all of its trading partners ahead of a tariff deadline.

title: Top Cuban official accuses Trump admin of escalating tensions
shortDescription: Trump and his top officials have taken a hardline approach to Cuba since he took office in January

title: Trump's DOJ to investigate Biden pardons, use of autopen
shortDescription: Biden pardoned his siblings and their spouses, saying his family had been “subjected to unrelenting attacks and threats."

title: Musk excoriates Trump's big tax bill as a 'disgusting abomination'
shortDescription: Days after leaving the White House, Elon Musk slammed President Trump's big tax bill. "I’m sorry, but I just can’t stand it anymore," Musk said.

title: Linda McMahon grilled by Senate over proposed cuts
shortDescription: Education Secretary Linda McMahon testified to Congress over proposed budget cuts.

title: New Jersey mayor sues Trump aides over arrest at immigration center
shortDescription: Newark Mayor Ras Baraka's lawsuit against Trump officials alleges he was arrested for trespassing without cause and maliciously prosecuted.

title: What NASA missions are on Trump's chopping block? Here's a look
shortDescription: Dozens of NASA's missions to explore the cosmos could be in jeopardy under a budget proposal from the Trump administration.

title: Judge tosses Trump tariff lawsuit but California won't back down
shortDescription: District Judge Jacqueline Corley ruled California should have sued in the Court of International Trade, which has jurisdiction over tariff disputes.

title: Trump lashes out at Sen. Rand Paul over opposition to big tax bill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump ripped Republican Sen. Rand Paul, saying his own constituents 'can't stand him.'

title: Trump vows fines, DOJ threatens to sue over California trans athlete
shortDescription: The president singled out a transgender high school athlete who placed first in the high jump and triple jump in California's track and field finals.

title: See Trump's new official portrait for his 2nd term
shortDescription: Trump's second term portrait shows the president unsmiling, a departure from his first term portrait and of his immediate predecessors.

title: Trump pardons Florida divers who cut 19 sharks free from longline
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pardoned two Florida shark divers convicted of theft for cutting 19 sharks from a fisherman’s line they assumed was illegal.

title: New Jersey governor primaries heat up, Trump wades into race
shortDescription: Republican and Democratic candidates alike are fighting in crowded fields to become their parties' nominee to lead the Garden State.

title: Is artistic expression a bedrock of our Constitution? | The Excerpt
shortDescription: The Trump administration is targeting “woke” culture. But can a democracy thrive without artistic freedom?

title: Is artistic expression a bedrock of our Constitution?
shortDescription: The Trump administration is targeting “woke” culture. But can a democracy thrive without artistic freedom?

title: Show and tell: Trump sets Wednesday deadline for tariff offers
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants to see countries' best offers by June 4, according to a draft letter.
